Make improvements to profits and quality and sustain those improvements. A must for small and medium business own... ( More ) What is Six Sigma? Turn your 'cash cow' into a 'golden goose'. Make improvements to profits and quality and sustain those improvements. A must for small and medium business owners who do not have a lot of time and money to dedicate to Six Sigma. for more books and products from this author, visit www.qimacros.com ( Less ) 7,257 Reads Info and Rating Category: Books - Non-fiction Rating: ( 3 Ratings) Upload Date: 07/17/2009 Copyright: Traditional Copyright: All rights reserved Tags: Business manufacturing small business quality improvement lean six sigma ( more tags ) Business manufacturing small business quality improvement lean six sigma increase profits six sigma simplified ( fewer ) Flag document for inapproriate content This is a private document.
